ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition aditivo = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity if aditivo == None: return
status = int(aditivo.Fields["STATUS"].Value) statusEmElaboracao = 1 if (status != statusEmElaboracao): widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
